Description:
Generous With Space And Warmth In Croydon Hills Estate
Prestigiously positioned within the prized 'Croydon Hills' estate, a picturesque pocket of native trees and rolling hills, with a most desirable convenience to sought-after amenities, this impeccably presented residence is a fantastic choice for first homebuyers, executive, downsizers and investors alike!
Placed deep within a quiet court setting surrounded by quality homes, and presenting an inviting streetscape, this light and engaging home is packed full of superior appointments for an optimal lifestyle.
Comprising a substantial formal lounge and dining domain naturally illuminated via full height multi-paned windows making the most of the leafy outlook, and an eye catching open fireplace with copper hood, set into exposed brick.
Conveniently adjoining, the central kitchen offers opportunity to update stylishly, well appointed with plentiful benchspace, double pantry, breakfast bar and quality appliances including dishwasher, with a convenient servery opening to the well-lit dining area accessing the covered alfresco via sliding doors. Extending off this sizeable, tiled area is the fabulous rumpus sure to be appreciated by the whole family.
Furthermore, the large master bedroom is complemented with a walk-in robe and bright full ensuite, while a spotless family bathroom (with separate shower and bathtub) plus a separate toilet is shared between the two double bedrooms both with built-in robes.
Further notable highlights include gas ducted heating, a two year old evaporative cooling system, six month old gas hot water service, fitted laundry with external access, solar panels, repointed tile roof, fresh paint throughout, driveway parking and remote double garage with high clearance, and the secluded, secure rear garden offers plenty of space for kids and pets to play.
Situated within walking distance to Yarrunga Reserve with wetlands, tennis court and BMX track, Narr-Maen Reserve with playground and walking trails, kinder and McAdam Square Shopping Centre, Croydon Hills and Good Shepherd Primary's, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar; with convenience to Croydon shopping and rail station, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre and Oxley College, and easy access to Ringwood with Eastland Shopping Centre and EastLink, this is a home you won't want to miss!
Proudly marketed by Barry Plant Real Estate Croydon
